mapper.update:
update tbl_competition
project_name = #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
competition_name = #{competitionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ranking = #{ranking,jdbcType=CHAR},
award_time = #{awardTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
award_category = #{awardCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
award_level = #{awardLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=CHAR},
edit_time = #{editTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
edit_by = #{editBy,jdbcType=CHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}

update tbl_competition set project_name = #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, competition_name = #{competitionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ranking = #{ranking,jdbcType=CHAR}, award_time = #{awardTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, award_category = #{awardCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, award_level = #{awardLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stu_id = #{stuId,jdbcType=CHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=CHAR}, edit_time = #{editTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, edit_by = #{editBy,jdbcType=CHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select:
select
from tbl_competition c join tbl_user u1 on c.stu_id = u1.id join tbl_user u2 on c.create_by = u2.id left join tbl_user u3 on c.edit_by = u3.id
and c.project_name like '%' #{projectName} '%'
and c.stu_id like '%' #{stuId} '%'
and u1.name like '%' #{stuName} '%'
order by c.create_time desc limit #{beginNo}, #{pageSize}

select count(*) from tbl_competition c join tbl_user u1 on c.stu_id = u1.id join tbl_user u2 on c.create_by = u2.id left join tbl_user u3 on c.edit_by = u3.id
and c.project_name like '%' #{projectName} '%'
and c.stu_id like '%' #{stuId} '%'
and u1.name like '%' #{stuName} '%'

select
from tbl_competition c join tbl_user u1 on c.stu_id = u1.id join tbl_user u2 on c.create_by = u2.id left join tbl_user u3 on c.edit_by = u3.id where c.id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}

select
from tbl_competition c join tbl_user u1 on c.stu_id = u1.id join tbl_user u2 on c.create_by = u2.id left join tbl_user u3 on c.edit_by = u3.id where c.id
